Classes/Channel/Config.html#/s:10StreamC.name: reactionsEnabled
Classes/Channel/Config.html#/s:10StreamC.abstract: If users are allowed to add reactions to messages. Enabled by default.

Classes/Channel/Config.html#/s:10StreamC.name: typingEventsEnabled
Classes/Channel/Config.html#/s:10StreamC.abstract: Controls if typing indicators are shown. Enabled by default.

Classes/Channel/Config.html#/s:10StreamC.name: readEventsEnabled
Classes/Channel/Config.html#/s:10StreamC.abstract: Controls whether the chat shows how far you’ve read. Enabled by default.

Classes/Channel/Config.html#/s:10StreamC.name: repliesEnabled
Classes/Channel/Config.html#/s:10StreamC.abstract: Enables message threads and replies. Enabled by default.

Classes/Channel/Config.html#/s:10StreamC.name: searchEnabled
Classes/Channel/Config.html#/s:10StreamC.abstract: Controls if messages should be searchable (this is a premium feature). Disabled by default.

Classes/Channel/Config.html#/s:10StreamC.name: mutesEnabled
Classes/Channel/Config.html#/s:10StreamC.abstract: Determines if users are able to mute other users. Enabled by default.

Classes/Channel/Config.html#/s:10StreamC.name: messageRetention
Classes/Channel/Config.html#/s:10StreamC.abstract: A number of days or infinite. Infinite by default.

Classes/Channel.html#/s:10StreamChat7Cha.name: memberIds
Classes/Channel.html#/s:10StreamChat7Cha.abstract: A list of user ids of the channel members.

Classes/Client/Config.html#/s:10StreamCh.abstract: A request callback queue, default nil (some background thread).
